title: ðŸ“¬ Mailbag Friday: Is Carson Wentz overrated, underrated or properly rated? (Football 8/14)
description:
2 Mailbags in 1 week! Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech answer YOUR questions from 5-star reviews on Apple Podcasts. Why does Will finish so few of his sentences (4:30)? GREAT QUESTION. The guys also get into the Eagles status as contenders this season and how Carson Wentz ranks among other quarterbacks in the NFC and the NFL (7:00). Bold predictions for 2020 will be coming in early September for this crew, but they briefly revisit some of last year's picks on this episode (32:00). And which wide receiver will break out (41:30)? Listen for some selections that could help your fantasy teams.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
